Cinematic Lighting: flat lighting, low contrast, overexposed, plain, low quality, blurry, 2d, cartoon
Studio Portrait Light: harsh shadows, natural light, outdoor, messy reflections, messy background, direct sun
Three-Point Lighting: flat lighting, one-dimensional, harsh shadows, overexposed, natural light
Rembrandt Lighting: flat face, no shadows, high-key, bright background, overexposed
Split Lighting: flat lighting, even illumination, soft shadows, low contrast
Loop Lighting: harsh shadows, flat lighting, messy reflections, profile shot
Paramount / Butterfly: side lighting, flat, messy shadows, unposed, natural sunlight, overhead sun
Clamshell Lighting: harsh shadows, high contrast, side lighting, dark eyes, textured shadows
Broad Lighting: narrow face shadows, dramatic depth, short lighting, dark foreground
Short Lighting: flat face, broad lighting, overexposed lit side, low contrast
Rim / Contour Light: flat, no depth, subject merged with background, bright background, no highlights, front lit
Soft Diffused Light: harsh shadows, high contrast, direct sunlight, hard edges, specular highlights
High-Key Lighting: dark, moody, shadows, black background, contrasty, film noir, night
Low-Key Lighting: bright, airy, high-key, low contrast, soft lighting, white background
Golden Hour: cool tones, mid-day, blue light, harsh shadows, overcast, neon, artificial light
Blue Hour: warm light, sun, yellow, bright day, noon, golden hour
Direct Sunlight: soft lighting, indoor, dark, diffused, night, long shadows, artificial light
Moonlit Night: sunlight, bright day, yellow light, warm tones, noon, high-key
Contre-Jour: front lit, flat, no silhouette, clear features, low contrast
Overcast Sky: hard sunlight, sharp shadows, harsh flash
Window Light: direct on-camera flash, top-down spotlight, infrared
Snow Reflection: warm red ambient, underexposed sickly lighting
Film Noir: colorful, bright, low contrast, soft lighting, sunny, pastel, vibrant
Neon / Cyberpunk: natural light, sunlight, monochrome, pastel, sepia, old fashioned
God Rays: clear air, no haze, flat light, night, no atmosphere
Firelight / Candle: cool blue light, daylight, bright, electric light, fluorescent, cold
Light Painting: static lighting, clear background, day, sharp focus on everything, no motion
Volumetric Fog: clear view, sharp background, sunny, high visibility, dry air
Underlight (Horror): soft beauty light, high-key, flat even lighting
Stage Spotlight: flat fill light, many light sources, evenly lit background
Car Headlights at Night: daylight sun, soft diffused studio, warm golden hour
Gelled Lighting: natural colors, white light, neutral balance, boring, realistic skin tones
Fluorescent / HMI: warm light, natural sun, golden hour, flickering-free, soft beauty light
Tungsten / Incandescent: cold light, blue, daylight, LED, fluorescent, high-key
LED Panel Lighting: harsh shadows, high contrast, flickering, colorful gels, natural sun
Iridescent / Luminescence: flat colors, matte texture, dull, non-reflective, dark
Translucency / SSS: opaque, plastic, solid, flat skin, no depth, dark shadow internals
Specular / Hard Shadows: soft light, diffused, matte, no reflections, flat lighting
HDRI Dome Lighting: direct on-camera flash, infrared surveillance, hard spotlights only
Bi-Color Split: neutral single-color lighting, flat color temperature
Harsh Flash: soft lighting, natural light, professional studio, balanced, volumetric rays, cinematic
CCTV / Infrared: colorful, high resolution, professional dslr, cinematic, vibrant, daylight
Through-the-Gap Light: fully lit, bright, open space, no shadows, overhead lighting
Red Room / Bordello: blue light, bright, daylight, cold, clean, sunlight
Streetlight: daylight, sun, bright, many light sources, indoor, morning
Morbid / Gritty: clean, bright, happy, colorful, saturated, professional, high-end, polished
Practical Lamp Light: daylight sun, outdoor bright, clinical fluorescent
Candle Cluster: fluorescent office light, bright daylight, high-key studio
Industrial Warehouse: high-key clean studio, fashion glamour, bright white background
Hospital Sterile: warm candlelight, red room glow, cozy tungsten
